body_html:
@soumith
The error came from my driver installation. The installation was really messy with few conflicts with older version (e.g: I found references of nvidia-304 ). I purged my system from any traces of nvidia drivers and reinstalled them properly, followed by a reboot.
Everything works fine now.

Sorry for the disturbing.

Everything works fine now.
Sorry for the disturbing.
body:
@soumith  
The error came from my driver installation. The installation was really messy with few conflicts with older version (e.g: I found references of nvidia-304 ). I purged my system from any traces of nvidia drivers and reinstalled them properly, followed by a reboot.
Everything works fine now.

Sorry for the disturbing.
